titleStmt.title: Scandalum magnatum, or, Potapski's case a satyr against Polish oppression.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas D'Urfey. Cf. Cambridge bibliography of English literature. New York [etc.] 1941. v. 2, p. 421.
Reproduction of original in University of Pennsylvania Library.
A satire on A.A. Cooper, Earl of Shaftesbury occasioned by his action of "Scandalum magnatum" against Cradock and Grahame, London, 1682. cf. Brit. Mus. Cat.
